verses.verse: It shall <S%H8085>happen,<s%> if you shall listen <S%H8085>diligently<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> all his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H5414>set<s%> you on <S%H5945>high<s%> above all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth:<s%>

and all these <S%H1293>blessings<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> on <S%H5381>you,<s%> and overtake <S%H8085>you,<s%> if you shall listen to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
You shall be <S%H1288>blessed<s%> in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and you shall be <S%H1288>blessed<s%> in the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

You shall be <S%H1288>blessed<s%> in the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H990>body,<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H127>ground,<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H929>animals,<s%> the <S%H7698>increase<s%> of your <S%H929>livestock,<s%> and the <S%H6251>young<s%> of your <S%H6629>flock.<s%>
Your <S%H2935>basket<s%> and your kneading <S%H4863>trough<s%> shall be <S%H1288>blessed.<s%>
You shall be <S%H1288>blessed<s%> when you come <S%H935>in,<s%> and you shall be <S%H1288>blessed<s%> when you go <S%H3318>out.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H5414>cause<s%> your <S%H341>enemies<s%> who rise <S%H6965>up<s%> against you to be <S%H5062>struck<s%> before <S%H6440>you.<s%> They will come <S%H3318>out<s%> against you <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> and will <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1870>ways.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H6680>command<s%> the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> on you in your <S%H618>barns,<s%> and in all that you <S%H4916>put<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H1288>to;<s%> and he will bless you in the <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> gives <S%H5414>you.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H6965>establish<s%> you for a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H7650>himself,<s%> as he has sworn to <S%H8104>you;<s%> if you shall keep the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H1980>walk<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways.<s%>

All the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> that you are <S%H7121>called<s%> by the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and they shall be afraid of <S%H3372>you.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will make you <S%H3498>plenteous<s%> for <S%H2896>good,<s%> in the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H990>body,<s%> and in the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H929>livestock,<s%> and in the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H127>ground,<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers<s%> to give <S%H5414>you.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H6605>open<s%> to you his <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H214>treasure<s%> in the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H4306>rain<s%> of your <S%H776>land<s%> in its <S%H6256>season,<s%> and to <S%H1288>bless<s%> all the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand:<s%> and you shall <S%H3867>lend<s%> to <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and you shall not <S%H3867>borrow.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H5414>make<s%> you the <S%H7218>head,<s%> and not the <S%H2180>tail;<s%> and you shall be above <S%H4605>only,<s%> and you shall not be <S%H4295>beneath;<s%> if you shall <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> to <S%H8104>observe<s%> and to <S%H6213>do,<s%>

and shall not turn <S%H5493>aside<s%> from any of the <S%H1697>words<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> to the right <S%H3225>hand,<s%> or to the <S%H8040>left,<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> to serve <S%H5647>them.<s%>

But it shall come to <S%H8085>pass,<s%> if you will not listen to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> all his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and his <S%H2708>statutes<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> that all these <S%H7045>curses<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> on <S%H5381>you,<s%> and overtake you.
You shall be <S%H779>cursed<s%> in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and you shall be <S%H779>cursed<s%> in the <S%H7704>field.<s%>
Your <S%H2935>basket<s%> and your kneading <S%H4863>trough<s%> shall be <S%H779>cursed.<s%>

The <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H990>body,<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H127>ground,<s%> the <S%H7698>increase<s%> of your <S%H504>livestock,<s%> and the <S%H6251>young<s%> of your <S%H6629>flock<s%> shall be <S%H779>cursed.<s%>
You shall be <S%H779>cursed<s%> when you come <S%H935>in,<s%> and you shall be <S%H779>cursed<s%> when you go <S%H3318>out.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H7971>send<s%> on you <S%H3994>cursing,<s%> <S%H4103>confusion,<s%> and <S%H4045>rebuke,<s%> in all that you <S%H4916>put<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H6213>do,<s%> until you are <S%H8045>destroyed,<s%> and until you <S%H6>perish<s%> <S%H4118>quickly;<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H7455>evil<s%> of your <S%H4611>doings,<s%> by which you have forsaken <S%H5800>me.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will make the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> <S%H1692>cling<s%> to <S%H3615>you,<s%> until he has consumed you from off the <S%H127>land,<s%> where you <S%H935>go<s%> in to possess <S%H3423>it.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H5221>strike<s%> you with <S%H7829>consumption,<s%> and with <S%H6920>fever,<s%> and with <S%H1816>inflammation,<s%> and with fiery <S%H2746>heat,<s%> and with the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and with <S%H7711>blight,<s%> and with <S%H3420>mildew;<s%> and they shall <S%H7291>pursue<s%> you until you <S%H6>perish.<s%>
Your <S%H8064>sky<s%> that is over your <S%H7218>head<s%> shall be <S%H5178>brass,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> that is under you shall be <S%H1270>iron.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H4306>rain<s%> of your <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H80>powder<s%> and <S%H6083>dust:<s%> from the <S%H8064>sky<s%> shall it come <S%H3381>down<s%> on <S%H8045>you,<s%> until you are destroyed.

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H5414>cause<s%> you to be <S%H5062>struck<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H341>enemies;<s%> you shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> against <S%H5127>them,<s%> and shall flee <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2189>them:<s%> and you shall be tossed back and forth among all the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

Your dead <S%H5038>body<s%> shall be <S%H3978>food<s%> to all <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and to the <S%H929>animals<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> and there shall be none to frighten them <S%H2729>away.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H5221>strike<s%> you with the <S%H7822>boil<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and with the <S%H2914>tumors,<s%> and with the <S%H1618>scurvy,<s%> and with the <S%H2775>itch,<s%> of which you <S%H3201>can<s%> not be <S%H7495>healed.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H5221>strike<s%> you with <S%H7697>madness,<s%> and with <S%H5788>blindness,<s%> and with <S%H8541>astonishment<s%> of <S%H3824>heart;<s%>

and you shall <S%H4959>grope<s%> at <S%H6672>noonday,<s%> as the <S%H5787>blind<s%> <S%H4959>gropes<s%> in <S%H653>darkness,<s%> and you shall not <S%H6743>prosper<s%> in your <S%H1870>ways:<s%> and you shall be only <S%H6231>oppressed<s%> and <S%H1497>robbed<s%> <S%H3117>always,<s%> and there shall be none to save <S%H3467>you.<s%>

You shall <S%H781>betroth<s%> a <S%H802>wife,<s%> and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H7901>lie<s%> with <S%H1129>her:<s%> you shall build a <S%H1004>house,<s%> and you shall not <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H5193>therein:<s%> you shall plant a <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> and shall not use its <S%H2490>fruit.<s%>

Your <S%H7794>ox<s%> shall be <S%H2873>slain<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and you shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of <S%H2543>it:<s%> your donkey shall be violently taken <S%H1497>away<s%> from before your <S%H6440>face,<s%> and shall not be <S%H7725>restored<s%> to <S%H6629>you:<s%> your sheep shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> to your <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and you shall have none to save <S%H3467>you.<s%>

Your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> to <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H5971>people;<s%> and your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H7200>look,<s%> and <S%H3616>fail<s%> with longing for them all the <S%H3117>day:<s%> and there shall be nothing in the <S%H410>power<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

The <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H127>ground,<s%> and all your <S%H3018>labors,<s%> shall a <S%H5971>nation<s%> which you <S%H3045>don't<s%> know eat <S%H398>up;<s%> and you shall be only <S%H6231>oppressed<s%> and <S%H7533>crushed<s%> <S%H3117>always;<s%>
so that you shall be <S%H7696>mad<s%> for the <S%H4758>sight<s%> of your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> which you shall <S%H7200>see.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H5221>strike<s%> you in the <S%H1290>knees,<s%> and in the <S%H7785>legs,<s%> with a <S%H7451>sore<s%> <S%H7822>boil,<s%> of which you can <S%H3201>not<s%> be <S%H7495>healed,<s%> from the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of your <S%H7272>foot<s%> to the crown of your <S%H6936>head.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H3212>bring<s%> <S%H4428>you,<s%> and your king whom you shall <S%H6965>set<s%> over <S%H1471>you,<s%> to a nation that you have not <S%H3045>known,<s%> you nor your <S%H1>fathers;<s%> and there you shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H68>stone.<s%>
You shall become an <S%H8047>astonishment,<s%> a <S%H4912>proverb,<s%> and a <S%H8148>byword,<s%> among all the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> where <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shall lead you <S%H5090>away.<s%>

You shall <S%H3318>carry<s%> <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> into the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and shall <S%H622>gather<s%> <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H622>in;<s%> for the <S%H697>locust<s%> shall consume <S%H2628>it.<s%>

You shall <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> and <S%H5647>dress<s%> <S%H8354>them,<s%> but you shall neither drink of the <S%H3196>wine,<s%> nor <S%H103>harvest;<s%> for the <S%H8438>worm<s%> shall eat <S%H398>them.<s%>

You shall have olive <S%H2132>trees<s%> throughout all your <S%H1366>borders,<s%> but you shall not <S%H5480>anoint<s%> yourself with the <S%H8081>oil;<s%> for your <S%H2132>olives<s%> shall drop <S%H5394>off.<s%>
You shall <S%H3205>father<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> but they shall not be <S%H3212>yours;<s%> for they shall go into <S%H7628>captivity.<s%>
All your <S%H6086>trees<s%> and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H127>ground<s%> shall the <S%H6767>locust<s%> <S%H3423>possess.<s%>

The <S%H1616>foreigner<s%> who is in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of you shall mount <S%H5927>up<s%> above you <S%H4605>higher<s%> and <S%H4605>higher;<s%> and you shall come <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H4295>lower<s%> and <S%H4295>lower.<s%>
He shall <S%H3867>lend<s%> to <S%H3867>you,<s%> and you shall not lend to <S%H7218>him:<s%> he shall be the head, and you shall be the <S%H2180>tail.<s%>

All these <S%H7045>curses<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> on <S%H7291>you,<s%> and shall pursue <S%H5381>you,<s%> and overtake <S%H8045>you,<s%> until you are destroyed; because you <S%H8085>didn't<s%> listen to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and his <S%H2708>statutes<s%> which he commanded <S%H6680>you:<s%>
and they shall be on you for a <S%H226>sign<s%> and for a <S%H4159>wonder,<s%> and on your <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

Because you <S%H5647>didn't<s%> serve <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> with <S%H8057>joyfulness,<s%> and with <S%H2898>gladness<s%> of <S%H3824>heart,<s%> by reason of the abundance of all <S%H7230>things;<s%>

therefore you shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> your <S%H341>enemies<s%> whom <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shall <S%H7971>send<s%> against <S%H7458>you,<s%> in hunger, and in <S%H6772>thirst,<s%> and in <S%H5903>nakedness,<s%> and in <S%H2640>want<s%> of all <S%H5414>things:<s%> and he shall put a <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%> on your <S%H6677>neck,<s%> until he has destroyed <S%H8045>you.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H5375>bring<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> against you from <S%H7350>far,<s%> from the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> as the <S%H5404>eagle<s%> <S%H1675>flies;<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> whose <S%H3956>language<s%> you shall not <S%H8085>understand;<s%>

a <S%H1471>nation<s%> of <S%H5794>fierce<s%> <S%H6440>facial<s%> <S%H5375>expressions,<s%> that shall not respect the <S%H6440>person<s%> of the <S%H2205>old,<s%> nor show <S%H2603>favor<s%> to the <S%H5288>young,<s%>

and shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H929>livestock,<s%> and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H127>ground,<s%> until you are <S%H8045>destroyed;<s%> that also shall not <S%H7604>leave<s%> you <S%H1715>grain,<s%> new <S%H8492>wine,<s%> or <S%H3323>oil,<s%> the <S%H7698>increase<s%> of your <S%H504>livestock,<s%> or the <S%H6251>young<s%> of your <S%H6629>flock,<s%> until they have caused you to <S%H6>perish.<s%>

They shall <S%H6887>besiege<s%> you in all your <S%H8179>gates,<s%> until your <S%H1364>high<s%> and <S%H1219>fortified<s%> <S%H2346>walls<s%> come <S%H3381>down,<s%> in <S%H2004>which<s%> you <S%H982>trusted,<s%> throughout all your <S%H776>land;<s%> and they shall <S%H6887>besiege<s%> you in all your <S%H8179>gates<s%> throughout all your <S%H776>land,<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has given <S%H5414>you.<s%>

You shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your own <S%H990>body,<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and of your <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> whom <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H4692>you,<s%> in the siege and in the <S%H4689>distress<s%> with which your <S%H341>enemies<s%> shall distress <S%H6693>you.<s%>

The <S%H376>man<s%> who is <S%H7390>tender<s%> among <S%H3966>you,<s%> and very <S%H6028>delicate,<s%> his <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall be <S%H3415>evil<s%> toward his <S%H251>brother,<s%> and toward the <S%H802>wife<s%> of his <S%H2436>bosom,<s%> and toward the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of his <S%H1121>children<s%> whom he has <S%H3498>remaining;<s%>

so that he will not <S%H5414>give<s%> to <S%H259>any<s%> of them of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of his <S%H1121>children<s%> whom he shall <S%H398>eat,<s%> because he has nothing <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H4692>him,<s%> in the siege and in the <S%H4689>distress<s%> with which your <S%H341>enemy<s%> shall <S%H6693>distress<s%> you in all your <S%H8179>gates.<s%>

The <S%H7390>tender<s%> and <S%H6028>delicate<s%> woman among <S%H5254>you,<s%> who would not adventure to <S%H3322>set<s%> the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of her <S%H7272>foot<s%> on the <S%H776>ground<s%> for <S%H6026>delicateness<s%> and <S%H7391>tenderness,<s%> her <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall be <S%H3415>evil<s%> toward the <S%H376>husband<s%> of her <S%H2436>bosom,<s%> and toward her <S%H1121>son,<s%> and toward her <S%H1323>daughter,<s%>

and toward her young <S%H7988>one<s%> who comes <S%H3318>out<s%> from between her <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and toward her <S%H1121>children<s%> whom she shall <S%H3205>bear;<s%> for she shall <S%H398>eat<s%> them for <S%H2640>want<s%> of all things <S%H5643>secretly,<s%> in the <S%H4692>siege<s%> and in the <S%H6693>distress<s%> with which your <S%H341>enemy<s%> shall <S%H6693>distress<s%> you in your <S%H8179>gates.<s%>

If you will not <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H8451>law<s%> that are <S%H3789>written<s%> in this <S%H5612>book,<s%> that you may <S%H3372>fear<s%> this <S%H3513>glorious<s%> and <S%H3372>fearful<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H3068>YAHWEH<s%> YOUR <S%H430>GOD;<s%>

then <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H6381>make<s%> your <S%H4347>plagues<s%> <S%H6381>wonderful,<s%> and the <S%H4347>plagues<s%> of your <S%H2233>seed,<s%> even <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>plagues,<s%> and of long <S%H539>continuance,<s%> and <S%H7451>severe<s%> <S%H2483>sicknesses,<s%> and of long <S%H539>continuance.<s%>
He will <S%H7725>bring<s%> on you again all the <S%H4064>diseases<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> which you were <S%H3025>afraid<s%> <S%H6440>of;<s%> and they shall cling to <S%H1692>you.<s%>

Also every <S%H2483>sickness,<s%> and every <S%H4347>plague,<s%> which is not <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of this <S%H8451>law,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H5927>bring<s%> them on <S%H8045>you,<s%> until you are destroyed.

You shall be <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H4592>few<s%> in <S%H4962>number,<s%> <S%H834>whereas<s%> you were as the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude;<s%> because you <S%H8085>didn't<s%> listen to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H6327>scatter<s%> you among all <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> from the one <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> even to the <S%H7097>other<s%> end of the <S%H5647>earth;<s%> and there you shall serve <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> which you have not <S%H3045>known,<s%> you nor your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> even <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H68>stone.<s%>

Among <S%H1992>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> you shall find no <S%H7280>ease,<s%> and there shall be no <S%H4494>rest<s%> for the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of your <S%H7272>foot:<s%> but <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H5414>give<s%> you there a <S%H7268>trembling<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and <S%H3631>failing<s%> of <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H1671>pining<s%> of <S%H5315>soul;<s%>

and your <S%H2416>life<s%> shall <S%H8511>hang<s%> in doubt <S%H5048>before<s%> <S%H6342>you;<s%> and you shall fear <S%H3915>night<s%> and <S%H3119>day,<s%> and shall have no <S%H539>assurance<s%> of your <S%H2416>life.<s%>

In the <S%H1242>morning<s%> you shall <S%H559>say,<s%> "I wish it <S%H5414>were<s%> <S%H6153>evening!<s%>" and at <S%H6153>evening<s%> you shall <S%H559>say,<s%> "I wish it <S%H5414>were<s%> <S%H1242>morning!<s%>" for the <S%H6343>fear<s%> of your <S%H3824>heart<s%> which you shall <S%H6342>fear,<s%> and for the <S%H4758>sight<s%> of your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> which you shall <S%H7200>see.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H7725>bring<s%> you into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> with <S%H591>ships,<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of which I <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7200>you,<s%> You shall see it no more <S%H3254>again:<s%> and there you shall <S%H4376>sell<s%> yourselves to your <S%H341>enemies<s%> for <S%H5650>bondservants<s%> and for <S%H8198>bondmaids,<s%> and no man shall buy <S%H7069>you.<s%>
